QuestData.Title: Xiao, the Eater
QuestData.Description: You may have already met my best student, Xiao, at the banquet tables. I personally would have graduated him several times over, but Instructor Xann insists that he needs more discipline.$b$bIf you ask me, discipline means very little if you win every fight you enter. I'm curious to see if Xiao can keep his streak alive against you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Caution: has been known to throw his food.
QuestData.LogDescription: Challenge and defeat Xiao at the Tian Monastery.
QuestData.CompletionText: Young Xiao has a great future in martial arts. I wish you luck in your upcoming match.
QuestData.RewardText: I must admit, I was never surprised, $r. You are a born fighter, and an excellent $c.
